website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced meal replacement powder that ships in individual packets for convenience.
pros: Can be mixed successfully with either milk or water
With 36 grams of protein per serving, it works especially well for athletes looking for a lean protein powder to help with workouts
Contains minimal amounts of fat and is gluten-free
cons: Some people will notice an odd aftertaste
Texture is a little thick for some people

customer_reviews.title: Old School for Real
customer_reviews.text: This is the same formula that I was using in college back in the 1990s. When you mix this, you need to use a lot of water because it mixes very thick. Taste is a little on the chalky side. Just like it was in the 1990s. This stuff was cutting edge when it came out, and I'm sure it's still decent. With all of the latest to come out of sports nutrition, I'm betting you can find something better for the money - because this still seems just as expensive as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: jp2code

customer_reviews.title: Met rx is the best
customer_reviews.text: If you work out a lot, this is the best protein drink in my opinion. Extreme chocolate flavor actually tastes pretty good. Gives you a blast of 36 grams of protein. I actually use it as a nutrition shake in the morning instead of breakfast. It says not to be used as meal replacement but ive had no issues. It is not exactly cheap, $60 for 40 packets but isnt bad for what you get. Definitely one of the best protein drinks around.
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: Tastes ok, doesn't mix well.
customer_reviews.text: I usually mix my shakes with a shake-n-drink bottle; put in the powder, water/milk, ice and shake. This brand clumps within seconds. If you can get the lid on and start shaking in 2-3 seconds, you will only have to chew a few smaller clumps. It also frequently clumps right at the drinking hole. Using a blender results in similar clumping and makes the blender a pain to clean. The flavor is fine, and it is filling. Just the mixing.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDave

customer_reviews.title: It's all about how you mix it.
customer_reviews.text: I found that mixing half (if using a shaker bottle) at a time, it will blend smoothly. I wait at least 30 minutes so it thickens up. I have tried mixing it all together once but it clumped bad. It's good with Cailifa unsweetened almond milk. I heard mixing it with water is gross(from my dad lol) It tastes like chocolate pudding to pudding to me!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Still the Best
customer_reviews.text: Even after all these years, nothing else compares. I love the taste of it. It is a meal - will fill you up. It has vitamins and fiber - you could live on this stuff. I use two of these every day - really there is no alternative and hope they never stop making it. It would be great if this exact thing as offered in a tub - if I weren't a 200 pound man, I could see a packet being too much.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great with juice or milk, mixes very well (I use a blender) and has several sources of nutrition. I like this as a pre-workout or post workout, or as a meal replacement. Very easy to digest and provides vitamins that are sometimes not easy to get in a daily diet. I was a die hard Myo-plex fan and still would be if they were still making their shakes, but Met-Rx gave me the next best thing and I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: William Thomas

customer_reviews.title: pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: its not bad...you get good amount of protein and a good amount of fat which most powders dont give you, and even some fiber...its fairly clean stuff, above average overall, probably better than most protein powders out there. the taste is mediocre but you should not be taking these types of products for their taste. the question is do you really need a product like this all the time? if you need this daily, your diet is probably screwed up. i do keep it around for a "rainy day" and take a packet or two with me on trips in case i need nutrition, like an emr/mre
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Always In Stock At Home - Delicious Lasting Taste
customer_reviews.text: I consume one packet approximately 5 times a week as a meal replacement. Sometimes I add collagen protein, MCT oil, and even Bailey's. Its great either made with ice cubes tastes like a thick milk shake. Warmed up is like a hot chocolate with marshmallows. Some meal replacements have to be consumed within about 20 minutes before the flavor changes. This Met-Rx's flavor stays great all day.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoBrew

customer_reviews.title: Oldy but a goodie
customer_reviews.text: It’s been around for a long time but it’s a good formulation. It’s a bit thick compared to some mrp you can find these days but mixed with a bit of fruit it’s pretty good and will stay with me for a while. The protein makeup is quality and meant to be a combination of slow and fast absorption. I wish it had less iron and a bit of fiber. I’ll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Conroejk

customer_reviews.title: the original
customer_reviews.text: best value cornmeal replacement. i used to drink these back in the 90's and decided to use metrx again. prettt thick but you can add more water or ice to thin it out. and actually one packet could be 2 shakes. prevents me from feeling hungry ---this huge box is way cheaper than i've found at any store---and cheaper than those huge barrels of powder that usually only have 14 servings --this is the most economical protein/meal replacement out there. just get this and a blender bottle and quit going to fast food places for lunch
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gangross

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews in which some consumers didn’t like, objected to or were surprised about the drink’s thickness, so I was prepared not to like it. In actuality, the thick consistency is what I love about it. It beats skipping lunch (which is pretty much every day at work), and sustains me. I use a 24 oz. shaker with a wire ball, fill it halfway with water, add the powder, fill it the rest of the way with water. Makes it much easier to blend.
customer_reviews.author: JDTampa

customer_reviews.title: Very chunky powder.
customer_reviews.text: This powder was very chunky. Very disappointed in texture. Flavor was just ok. Has an after taste. I could only drink a couple before I decided this powder was not for me. Now I have a huge box left. Try to get a sample from somewhere so you can try it out first. I would not buy agin.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Albright

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, fast, easy. Get a Blender Bottle to go with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great, convenient, a perfect mate for a BlenderBottle. Tastes good, and is easy portion control or a quick fuel-up after a hard workout without having to cook or have meals prepared. The taste is better than "palatable," it's actually decent. But to me the vanilla is even better -- it actually tastes like a treat. A Blender Bottle works perfectly with it -- put in enough water to cover the ball first, then the powder, then the rest of the water. Then put the lid on tightly and shake. It blends very nicely, with no large powdery clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Milochik

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Meal supplement protein drink.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a great tasting meal supplement protein, MET-Rx is the best. I use it every day as my lunch and sometimes my dinner too. It’s the best way to keep your weight down, or lose weight, while preserving muscle mass. I am 59 years old and I am down to the weight I was when I was 30 years old. I owe that in part two MET-Rx.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A full meal replacement, without all the bad stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I’m retired from law enforcement and a former member of my department’s Special weapons team. There are those days when you get the call and you haven’t eaten. Throw some OJ, pack of Metrx some fruit, and I’m on the go! I’ve used this product for over 25 years. I strongly recommend it. Yes it is a little more expensive, and it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Roger W Sonsini

customer_reviews.title: Smart Nutrition at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product in the past and it is still awesome! I use it in the mornings before work to keep my food intake optimal and give me energy levels high for my active day. I plan on increasing to two packets as soon as I can get a consistent workout regimen in place, but for now, one seems to be good. In addition to the quality, the reason I came back to Met-Rx was price. I am sure there are lots of good products out there, but Met-Rx has a proven track record at a great price and that's exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: DadOrDieTrying

customer_reviews.title: Still love it but wish the pricing was lower
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for almost 25 years and still a favorite. For those of you new to MetRx OR unhappy with the taste? I'd suggest 2 cups of skim milk with the MetRx in the blender. Works great. (To be exact - a touch over 2 cups, maybe 2 and a quarter but not more) Good for breakfast, after the gym, whenever :)
customer_reviews.author: Manasseh

customer_reviews.title: A MetRx User For 26 years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 26 years and still enjoy it. I buy the original vanilla flavor. Get creative and add 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon or 1 teaspoon cocoa powder or 1 tablespoon peanut butter or fresh strawberries. For added flavor add a heaping teaspoon malt powder and for crunch add 3 teaspoons grape nuts cereal. Product is best if you use a blender (chill your blender container in the freezer for 20 minutes before using. This will enhance the flavors you choose to use.)
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Huge portion gets you full
customer_reviews.text: Huge portion for being on a diet. I mix this with 24 oz of water in a blender and feel very full when I'm finished. Mixing with the recommended 16 oz gives the consistence of jello instant pudding. Flavor is very chocolatey, like baking cocoa, but not terribly sweet which I like. Could be why other reviewers don't like the flavor. Excellent if you add a half of a banana or other fruit. I use water but if you weren't as strict on calories, you could use skim milk and I imagine it would be very creamy.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Robertson

customer_reviews.title: An excellent, high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is probably the best meal replacement on the market. There's plenty of others but they are very expensive and just don't seem to meet the high standards that the product contains. When it comes to meal replacements, this is the only brand that I will buy!
customer_reviews.author: James Pattersenn Jr

customer_reviews.title: Have tried other brands but don't like the flavor or the way it mixes
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious into losing weight and getting fit, this is the product I have used for years...as a personal trainer and very conscious of what and how much I eat.....this is breakfast, blended with frozen fruit each morning after a serious workout. Have tried other brands but don't like the flavor or the way it mixes. Protein helps you build and maintain muscle, and ladies you cannot bulk up unless you take steroids. At 69, I am in as good shape physically as I ever was, healthy, strong and fit. Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE TASTE
customer_reviews.text: I tried this with water, coconut milk, and regular milk.....by the 3rd try, I was ready to barf. Returned. As usual, Amazon was amazing when it comes to a return/refund! It's back to Labrada for me! Stay with what you know...
customer_reviews.author: NetaB

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used dozens of different protein powders over the years, but this is the first one that has given me the raging trots. I don't know anyone else's experience with this stuff, but it goes through me like a Japanese Bullet train. Use with caution...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Deadlift

customer_reviews.title: Don't Miss This One ! Subscribe and Save! Best Tasting Shake Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best tasting protein, meal replacement shakes ever. If this was sold as a shake from a large coffee shop, I would buy this and not think twice. The taste is that amazing. This is the most well rounded nutritional ones that I have found as well. Great amount of Vitamins, plus all the Branch Chain Amino Acids.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Supplement Packets
customer_reviews.text: I have used this supplement off and on for years when told about it by a coworker. The only thing that I would really comment on is that seems like the packets have gotten smaller or less contents over the years. ...Kind of like a candy bar costing more money and getting smaller at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: High quality meal replacement powder!
customer_reviews.text: High quality protein meal replacement shake. Bought this for it's quantity & price per serving. This was the best price I could find at the time & the free shipping helped as well. Taste is very good & the shakes are very thick...not watery like most. It gives you the feeling your actually putting something inside you that will stick.
customer_reviews.author: dmarz7588

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, filling, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I have them with crushed ice and water, mixed in a blender. The taste is very good and they are filling. I actually use them for dinner as a meal replacement on some days. They are definitely helping me lose weight. The only issue for me is that the powder is not terribly soluble. It can be tough to mix. Otherwise, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jebo from Cali

customer_reviews.title: Met Rx Chocolate Rocks.
customer_reviews.text: This order was perfect. I mean perfect. They arranged the individual packets correctly. So everything was balanced. The order was hand delivered to me by an employee who was wearing a reflective vest so I did not have to guess. The order was early. That in itself was nice. Im impressed. Amazon really seems to listen to customers suggestions for improvement. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Evans

customer_reviews.title: The best tasting high protein meal replacement, and I have tried a lot of them.
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this for over 15 years. I blend a shake every morning with 16oz. Of cold water, a Starbucks Via instant coffee, and a cup of ice. So good! My wife love it with cherry flavored sparkling water and ice.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Best chocolate around
customer_reviews.text: Drinking this since the early 90's when it first came out. Best chocolate around. I have a hard time with powdered drinks. Most taste to bitter or don't mix well. This mixes easy and I still have many recipes from the early days. Favorite is Choc Pudding. Add 2 cups cold mix, blend in Met-RX packet for 1min, then add 2TBSP Sugar Free Choc Pudding and blend in. Gets thick so may have to use a spatula to help mixing. I fold in a cup of low fat whip Cream and chill for 1hr. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Leduc

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Gluten Free Original Vanilla... but it tastes like sh**
customer_reviews.text: MetRx has a great name... but this meal replacement drink (Original Vanilla, Gluten Free) tastes like sh**. Won't buy it again. Looking for a different product now. I wish EAS never went out of business because I loved Myoplex...
customer_reviews.author: Prime User

customer_reviews.title: Good shake that will fill you up.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it tastes good if you mix it with really cold water. I like to use ICE in the water and let it sit for a bit then add about a third of the mix and shake it up then add more water and more mix and shake again then add the rest of the mix with more water. It makes a really big shake and is very filling. Not been taking it long enough to know if there will be positive benefits but the nutrient portions are really great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome calorie booster
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it you need to bulk up this is a good product, I won’t use anything but this for calorie intake and muscle gains.... it will make you fat if you don’t do serious work
customer_reviews.author: Robert kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Posting 4 stars because it is a really wonderful deal considering one packet can really be 2 meals! I do not like the taste (my opinion) and it is extrememly difficult to mix (even putting liquid+mix+liquid)
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Has a "runny pudding" sort of texture after you mix it with about 16 ounces of liquid. Not very tasty, either. Won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: I like it way better then Boost or Ensure.
customer_reviews.text: Loaded with vitamins/minerals/protein and a lot more filling then boost, ensure and especially Slimfast(IMO). Mixing it is a total PIA though. Forget stirring it or using a shaker bottle, this stuff needs a full on blender. Another tip, don't poor the whole pouch in at once. Gradually poor it in through the whole in the cap while the blender is running. The stuff coagulates very quickly and will not blend properly if it isn't mixed with uniform perfection every time. Stick it in the fridge and have a sad tasting pudding for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: L234

customer_reviews.title: He's losing weight!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? My hubby was struggling to lose weight after hip replacement surgery and nothing worked till he started using this a month ago! He's already lost 10 lbs and counting, so if you are on the fence, give this a try! Try their protein bars also....extremely filling!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I've purchased Met-RX meal replacement powder, and it will not be the last. I have yet to find a meal replacement that tastes better (I use 2% milk, personally) or that fills me up better. I can easily make it several hours on a single packet and not get hungry. I find these especially useful on busy mornings where I know work is going to keep me running all day long and lunch is a "maybe" instead of a sure thing. Would highly recommend to anyone that is looking for a good meal replacement or for an easy way to add some additional nutrition in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still the best quality MRP protein shake out there.
customer_reviews.text: I hope they don't discontinue this, I've been using it for 25+ years. Nothing really compares to it as a meal replacement. Very high quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Dougo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good. Even better price.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something more affordable to replace shakeology. This shakes has a good taste, even just with water. Milk makes the shake thicken considerably, which is good if you are wanting to use it as a real meal replacement to keep you full and have enough energy during the day. I would recommend this if you are also looking for an alternative to some more expensive shakes. The price is reasonable considering how much I got. I also love the fact that these are individually packaged. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Navarrete Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Power packed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff for years, it sure works for me. I feel stronger and more energetic .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: They are a good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: They blend super thick, they don't taste bad but they aren't the best shake I've ever had. Very convenient in the packets though, that's why I get them otherwise you have to do the ziplock bags and we all know how that is.
customer_reviews.author: punkin73315

customer_reviews.title: MetRx - the Best Metabolic Optimizer... for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love my MetRx protein packs... the formula is the very best I have tried (been using proteins for 25 years), and this is the very best... it blends easily, it tastes great... and I love the way my body responds to the nutrients too!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: I'm ordering more
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I tried chocolate and now vanilla, both are great.Thick, creamy, mixes with water well, tastes great - if you've only ever had typical whey protein and then you try this you're in for a very positive surprise.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome meal replacement shake!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to find something to replace the Advocare Meal Replacement Shakes but for less cost. I still wanted the individual packaging for convenience - and of course, the taste! After doing comparisons...this was the best one for me! It's higher in sodium but better in everything else - especially protein! And the chocolate flavor is good! Tastes like chocolate milk - a little thick...but most of these shakes are. Really great find!!!
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good flavor. Has a good taste that fills me up all morning. Excellent for after a morning workout.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling to places where room service doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for traveling abroad and camping. Portion is large. I mix with fruits other foods so a half portion is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Evans

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years
customer_reviews.text: This has become one of my favorite protein supplements. Taste good and mixes well with other proteins and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: darrell a.

customer_reviews.title: True Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with some of the packets -- worked with Jessica of Amazon and they made it right. Very impressed with the service and product! Thank you Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I know a lot of people say it’s too thick, I tell them to add more liquids
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this on and off for 20 years, I love it! It really fills me up, I take it to keep my weight up, so I mix it with a yogurt smoothie, almond milk, I shake it, put it into the fridge for 20 minutes it gets real thick, so I add more almond milk, and it comes out smoother, I find the taste better than other protein shakes,
customer_reviews.author: jennifer c petrowski

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my body to digest.
customer_reviews.text: Almost all protein supplements cause gas or other digestion problems with myself( lactose intolerance ). It's been many years since I used Met-Rx, and I'm glad I started to use it again. It's very thick mixing it with water, and tastes very chocolatey( only a little artificial sweetener after taste ). A good price for 40 servings. Will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Andujar

customer_reviews.title: High protein
customer_reviews.text: I like met-Rx. I feel that this is there best product for gains in size and strength. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best Chocolate Taste Out There
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. It's consistent, tastes great, and provides the highest level of protein and lowest levels of sugar and fat. I use it immediately after every workout (cardio or weights).
customer_reviews.author: Feedback2019

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have been using for many years. I like how thick it mixes up because it satisfies my hunger much more than other shakes out there. I usually eat it as a pudding with just a small amount of water in a bowl and mix with a spoon. Delicious! Otherwise, mix with water and ice cubes in a blender and it is a very thick and delicious and satisfying shake.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: The powder tastes great, I personally combine it with milk in excess ...
customer_reviews.text: The powder tastes great, I personally combine it with milk in excess of the recommended amount. Using the recommended amount of liquid will give a very thick shake which I find difficult to drink quickly. This is easily fixed by adding more liquid. In my experience adding milk instead of water gives the product a sweeter, more savory taste. 5/5 will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Best meal replacement out their period.
customer_reviews.text: Benn using met -rx for twenty years still the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Manocchio

customer_reviews.title: The OG Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: The OG Meal Replacement. Good value. Mix 4 oz of almond milk + 7 oz water + crushed ice + 1 packet, put in a blender. Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: The taste isn't the best but it fills you up and keeps you feeling ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste isn't the best but it fills you up and keeps you feeling full throughout the day. It comes in easy convenient bags that you can leave in your gym bag and don't have to worry about it taking up too much space. I would recommend the vanilla because you can add the crystal lite or mio to the vanilla to make your own custom flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Misty and William

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get this!!! Expired!
customer_reviews.text: One box was fine and the other tasted off and seemed expired or potentially in the wrong temp for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: esoul

customer_reviews.title: Simple The Best
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for well over 10 years and will continue to do so. I really think that this is all I should need to say but since Amazon has a length requirement on reviews, Met-RX tastes great, makes you feel like you actually ate a meal, the protein is great quality and it makes for amazing smoothies. Cons, well I guess it is expensive and you will need to use a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Still tastes GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Met-Rx many years ago, when I was in the best shape of my life, and I LOVED it. I've put weight on now that I turned 40, and I am incorporating this into my daily meal plan once again. Works great for my morning meal, post-workout, or when I miss dinner. It still tastes great!!! It's like my body remembers it and has been missing it all these years :) I mix it up with 16oz of spring water, banana, splash of OJ, handful of strawberries or other berry. I mix it in a blender when I can because it gets whipped up into an awesome, frothy, drink/meal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Bloated
customer_reviews.text: The numbers in nutrition are right for my needs. But....it's way too thick and its bloating me really bad. I have to use the bathroom within an hour and there's no way I can take one in the morning prior to work just for that reason. Love their bars but will not buy the cake mix again.
customer_reviews.author: Used and abused

customer_reviews.title: Won’t ever buy again
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. My husband can usually down anything, but even trying it different ways this was just way to thick and gross for him
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: best meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: this is the only protein drink, meal replacement that i can drink that does not have a taste you get tired of, great product that I have used it for years, satisfying. I have tried many and come from the fitness industry . this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: S Linton

customer_reviews.title: The best protein powder hands down
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. The best as always. No protein powder compares. Wish it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mjmj

customer_reviews.title: These shakes are great!! Not chalky
customer_reviews.text: These shakes are great!! Not chalky. Not gritty. I mix with water and they are thick and very chocolatey. By far the best. And please trust and believe we have tried many.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Met-Rx Meal Replacement
customer_reviews.text: As a nutritionist, I've used Met-Rx for both myself and for clients. High in quality protein, low in fats and carbs, as well as loaded with daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. I've worked with all levels of clientele and all have liked the option of using Met-Rx to fulfill their daily requirement of Protein.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Met-Rx for years. It is a very good post workout supplement as well as a meal replacement for my days off from the gym. Good taste, good consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Anne

customer_reviews.title: I have had nothing but excellent experiences with it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since the mid-90's, I have had nothing but excellent experiences with it. It makes me feel full for hours, but not so much I can't workout. I don't know what it is, but this stuff is beast mode.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement that is high in protein. Great for adding mass and a quick meal replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Flower357

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes fantastic. It's almost like eating cake or brownie batter. If you're not into either of those, look elsewhere. I will say that this stuff can be difficult to mix if you don't have a good shaker. Anything that has a wire shaker ball will work great. Otherwise, a blender works well too, but will cause the liquid to have quite a bit of fluff to it. Right now I am having one of these for lunch each day along with a granola bar. Great way to boost your protein intake and get a lot of other great stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Koshinski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for busy individuals
customer_reviews.text: I have been a longtime fan of Met-Rx products and this product lives up to the standard set by the brand. High quality protein and vitamins in convenient packs, easy to throw in your bag for after workout or when you are staying late at work and do not have time to get away to go buy something to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and nutrition.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a breakfast drink. I get the protein I need as well as so many other nutrients. Very filling for the amount of calories. Great chocolate taste! A bit pricey. If it keeps going up, I will have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Using this as a male, 38 as a lunch ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a male, 38 as a lunch replacement. It fills me up from 12:40 to 6pm. I just ordered my second box today (I when for chocolate this time). I started out at 201 pounds (Im 5 9), As of this morning (not changing any other habits) I weigh 188.1 :)
customer_reviews.author: StevieB

customer_reviews.title: Lacks flavor and texture is gross.
customer_reviews.text: This was like chocolate pudding but with very little chocolate flavor. It was gross. I wanted to use this as a meal replacement but I can't. The flavor is lacking and the texture is gross.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Taste and nutrition
customer_reviews.text: 6oz of 2% milk, 140z of water, 1 banana, 2tbsp peanut butter and 6 ice cubes...delicious. Sometimes i Mixx it in with my cereal.
customer_reviews.author: sandie

customer_reviews.title: Be healthy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my breakfast everyday for over 20yrs. Also been my pre or post workout drink. Sometimes am hungry but nothing sounds good so make a shake instead. Add some chocolate syrup or bananas or a teaspoon of peanut butter to change it up. Lasts around 5hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Z.

customer_reviews.title: Better deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Been using Met-Rx for about 10 years. Vitamin Shoppe stopped stocking it. Better deal on Amazon, by far. Everything in one packet. Just ad water. 35 grams of protein plus all the bells and wistles. Can't beat it. Makes it easy to track daily protein intake.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyJohn

customer_reviews.title: Flavour is superb... no one else compares ...
customer_reviews.text: Flavour is superb...no one else compares. I’ve been eating this regularly for over 30 years Priced competitively
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Perfect meal....
customer_reviews.text: Love this meal replacement mix because it tastes good, but also because it's thick, like a shake, and makes taking vitamins so much easier. I can't take them without this...finally, these meal replacements keep me full between 3-4 hours, so that's great!
customer_reviews.author: M3F

customer_reviews.title: but in my opinion nothing work as good as Met-RX
customer_reviews.text: I tried Met-RX when it first became available and have tried a plethora of product since, but in my opinion nothing work as good as Met-RX. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Wayah

customer_reviews.title: tastes great, filling
customer_reviews.text: so this stuff has some type of cake/pancake batter quality to it that makes it thicken and expand a bit when blended (in a blender) -that is a good thing, cause i think that makes it more filling. The vanilla flavor is neutral enough so that if i throw in some fruit it makes a great smoothie too!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder makes for a great meal replacement/supplement and has a big advantage over many of its competitors: it is actually edible. Some others might brag that they have 2 or 3 more grams of protein, but you would rather eat a big bag of hair than drink them. MET-Rx has a good size serving of protein and doesn't taste half bad.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Ships to APO address which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: tgkrohn

customer_reviews.title: MET-Rx - Simply the Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: What can be said about MET-Rx? It’s still the best meal supplement for building muscles. I’ve used others over the 27 years but, IMHO... it’s simply the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: "...and it's tasty, too!!!"
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had this for breakfast for more years than I can remember. One packet makes two large drinks. He says he feels better when drinking it and notices a difference when he occasionally misses a few days. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! It is perfect for what I am trying to achieve. I found that it mixes best with coconut water. Put some spinach and a banana a few icecubes and it is the perfect meal!! Will definitely order again...thank you😊
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Dolbashian

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and nutrition. Gives me a lot of energy and it great for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: That's Fantastic!! :)

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I don't often give out 5 stars but this taste really surprised me, even when mixed with just water it taste really good, not like any other powders I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.text: Been doing this for breakfast smoothie for several yrs. Tase is great, good protein. Good price here, Service is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: White slim, taste just okay
customer_reviews.text: Kinda slimy in texture unless you beat the heck out of it in a blender. If you want to use a shaker cup be prepared for white slim. Taste is just okay, not the same Met-Rx I remember from the early days when it first arrived.
customer_reviews.author: darqman

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should try this!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, you were fast in delivering, I Love the taste, no after taste like other different products have. I will be ordering again. I've only been drinking this for 5 days but I feel full, with natural energy. No shakiness feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Loved

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this protein when it cost $60 for a box of 18...so needless to say the price is much better these days. Its easier to mix because I've gotten the hang of it. But if you don't know how to do it, you can end up with a big mess on your hands, unless you use a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jippy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Met-Rx meal replacement protein for a few days now. I must say that this protein shake is very filling. I started using a full package, but cutback and make 2 shakes with one package. For me, the shake was too thick. Using half the amount, the shake is still thick but definitely good. I also like that it's not too sweet which I have tried a few brands now. Definitely try it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Met-rx is superior!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Met-rx since the early 90s. There is no better product on the market for building your body
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bavota

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. Feeling full and sated for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Clair

customer_reviews.title: I get 2 meals from one packet.
customer_reviews.text: Great easy to drink meal replacement with lots of vitamins, and minerals . I mix 1 packet with 2 1/2 glasses of milk, and drink 1/2 with lunch and 1/2 with supper. It is very thick I can eat it with a spoon, if I want.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G. Dollerd

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a meal replacement. It is very thick, however I mix my protein shakes in a blender. The taste is ok for a protein shake. Not bad, but nothing to brag about either. I will keep buying these until the price gets too high.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect meal replacement. I add fresh spinach, strawberries, blue berries, black berries, cranberry juice, mango-pineapple juice, crushed ice, honey. For the perfect smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and mixing is easy just use 32 oz gateraid
customer_reviews.author: HMD

product_meta.title: MET-Rx Original Whey Protein Powder,Meal Replacement Shakes, Low Carb, Gluten Free, Extreme Chocolate, Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, and Zinc to Support Immune Health, 2.54oz. Packets, 40 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Extreme ChocolateMET-Rx Meal Replacement powder boxed - Extreme Chocolate 40 -Count Packets Box
feature_bullets: You will receive (40) single-serve packets of MET-Rx Original Whey Protein Powder, Chocolate, 2.54 oz

DELICIOUS AND NUTRITIOUS: The Extreme Chocolate flavor of MET-Rx Original Meal Replacement makes a delicious, creamy breakfast whether you make it with milk or water. Low fat & aspartame free, it's a delicious way to start your day or fuel your workout.

MET-Rx products have been specifically formulated with a precise nutrient profile to produce specific metabolic effects. MET-Rx Original Meal Replacement is no exception. Try with protein supplements or bars to superpower your workout.

MET-Rx FOCUSES ON THE POWER of protein & other important nutrients for workout enhancement. Our protein blends support exercise recovery & provide important amino acids to fuel muscles, while our sports nutrition line takes care of pre-intra-post workout.

COMPARE TO YOUR FAVORITES: Compare MET-Rx products to New Whey, About Time, ALLMAX, Nature's Blent, JYM, Vital Proteins, Optimum Nutrition, Pro-Stat, Integrated Supplements, Universal Nutrition, On my Whey, Cellucor, Nature's Design, or Manitoba Harvest.
Contains a significant source of Vitamin A, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, and Zinc to Support Immune Health

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
